snippet: TESTA--Andrew H. of Sunrise Hill Circle, Orange, CT and Palm Beach Gardens, FL, formerly of Stamford, CT, passed away Friday, April 22, 2016. He was the devoted husband of Doreen (Zlotnick) Testa and the proud father of Marc and Alan. Interment was in the Agudath Sholom Cemetery, Stamford, CT. 1/3
lead_paragraph: TESTA--Andrew H. of Sunrise Hill Circle, Orange, CT and Palm Beach Gardens, FL, formerly of Stamford, CT, passed away Friday, April 22, 2016. He was the devoted husband of Doreen (Zlotnick) Testa and the proud father of Marc and Alan. Interment was in the Agudath Sholom Cemetery, Stamford, CT. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TESTA, ANDREW H
